title: when I run League of Legends I get this message
body:
C:/Riot Games/league of legends/yaml.dll is not designed to run on Windows or contains an error. Attempting to reinstall the program by means of the original installation media, or contact the system administrator of the software manufacturer for assistance.

I allredy unistalled, reinstall, ran multiple fixes including hextech repair tool and also deactivated firewall and ran as administrator and i still get this message if anyone knows what i should do please help me out thank you

replies.body: Hmmmm sounds like some of those game files didn't get installed in the best way. We should be able to fix this up pretty easily, but it's going to be best to do this in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) where our tech guys can guide you through the steps!
are there any new updates ive been 3 days without league ive updated to w10 and reinstalled it and everything and i still cant play please help ðŸ˜”
